entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • browser-wasm linux Release LibraryTests timeout #100424
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.JSImportTest.MissingImport test fails on CI leg: browser-wasm linux Release LibraryTests_Threading #100421
  • [API Proposal]: Extend BlobBuilder so consumers can better control allocations #100418
  • dotnet nuget sign error: Unknown error (0xc100000d) #100414
  • .NET 8 Runtime Bad Signature / Certificate for MacOS arm64 #100413
  • [browser][MT] make UI thread not managed/attached #100411
    Future
  • [browser][AOT] CollectionsMarshalTests.GetValueRefOrNullRefClass #100409
  • AVX512 codegen issues #100404
  • Double.TryParse fails on string that has thousands separator. Regression? #100397
  • [API Proposal]: Change Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Environments fields to consts #100396
  • [wasi] Cannot find host wasmtime #100394
    9.0.0
  • [browser][mt] SignalRClientTests timeouts #100388
  • Add missing RID combinations for Gentoo AND/OR hard-set RID for .NET build #100383
  • Test failure: GC/LargeMemory/Regressions/largearraytest/largearraytest.sh #100382
  • string.IndexOf() on Thai Culture , Windows11, 64 bits, .net5,6,7,8, return incorrect index #100381

Closed

  • Assertion failed 'change >= 0' #100350
  • SortedList allocates memory due to boxing of TKey #100406
  • [NativeAot] win-x86: Funclets getting double called #99687
  • Kmac.IsSupported returns different value in RemoteExecutor #100412
    9.0.0
  • [android] trimmer warning for `System.Private.CoreLib.dll` #100256
  • [mono][wasm] Add interpreter support for calls to UnmanagedCallersOnly EntryPoint without managed delegate reference #95087
    9.0.0
  • [browser][nodejs][MT] Worker script fails to start on NodeJS #87556
    Future
  • Fix breaking change when using lazy loading with webcil #100292
    9.0.0
  • [Wasm Runtime Pack] `<GenerateJSModuleManifest>false</GenerateJSModuleManifest>` should be done in a props file #99491
    9.0.0
  • MetadataLoadContext: Custom attribute enum argument parsing fails for non-core System.Enum-derived type because IsEnum is false #98658
    9.0.0
  • HTTP2 code coverage: add tests for DATA frame with PAD bit set #1503
    Future
  • [mono][interpreter] Occasional failures of GC/Regressions/v2.0-beta2/452950 on OSX arm64 Mono interpreter #100398
  • [ci] Playwright test times out/fails because target closed #99961
  • Byte[] initializer error Expression or initializer expected #100325
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 2 Regressions on 3/16/2024 1:13:28 AM #99965

PullRequests

Created

  • Restore StubSecretArg from stack #100428
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove global spinlock for EH stacktrace #100427
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Always zero-init if object contains pointers #100426
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • More general VN const casting #100423
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix optAssertionProp_Update for IND of handle constant replacement #100422
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Update dependson for mono perf jobs #100420
    area-Infrastructure, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Ensure that Sse3.MoveAndDuplicate correctly tracks supporting SIMD scalar loads #100417
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Disable default and ambient attribute at runtime with a feature switch #100416
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • [browser][MT] smaller thread pool #100415
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] disableManagedTransition on UI thread after start #100410
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] fix error propagation when calling JSImport of missing JS function #100408
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasi] Select mono components #100407
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • Add span detection in Enumerable.First(predicate) #100405
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • Use macros to form the ARM64 instruction format search table #100403
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Reduce false pinning from interp stack #100400
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Make it possible to eliminate branches guarded by IsEnum #100399
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make it possible to trim custom attribute artifacts #100395
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Use SoftFP ABI on linux-bionic-arm #100392
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • DATAS tuning changes for small HCs #100390
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Experiments with runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #100389
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add type-specialized vectorized hash table container #100386
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix the typo in IOptionsFactory source documentation #100384
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • Adding missed synchronization #100380
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove non INPLACE_RUNTIME NativeAOT paths, cleanup exceptions #100379
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: fix count reconstruction problem #100385
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAOT/win-x86: Enable FEATURE_EH_CALLFINALLY_THUNKS #99718
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix initialization by KMAC #100419
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Allow trimming FeatureGuard and FeatureSwitchDefinition attributes #100263
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • Add support for the ISOSDacInterface14 api #100364
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [wasi] Basic usage docs #100354
    documentation, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] Force interpreter to initialize the pointers #100288
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix a linker warning with the JsonSerializerOptionsUpdateHandler #100362
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix exception interception on ARM64 with new EH #100349
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Revert "xor before setcc" opt #100298
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0][browser] WebSocket works differently depending on if we look up its state or not #99673
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [NativeAOT] Remove TargetAbi.CppCodegen and TargetAbi.Jit #100393
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement swift lowering algorithm in Mono's type system #99439
    area-Interop-mono
  • [ci] Fix Playwright test times out/fails because target closed #100074
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Eliminate unused virtual methods we detect after optimizations #100286
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove support for non-indirect code headers #100351
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Improve collided exception performance #100169
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Vectorized `GetNonRandomizedHashCode` #98838
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Start moving over to official templates #99433
    area-Infrastructure, linkable-framework
  • Getting vxsort working on Linux amd64 #98712
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix for stress failure when adjusting effective IP while stackwalking may put it on a wrong instruction. #100376
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace FEATURE_EH_FUNCLETS in JIT with runtime switch #99191
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Special casing `System.Guid` for COM VARIANT marshalling #100377
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Enable NativeAOT win-x86 runtime tests #99688
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • STJ: Dispose enumerator on exception #100194
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Convert OAVariant interop to managed #100176
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Data Descriptor Spec #100253
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Remove requirement for building packs to run host tests and infrastructure around restoring test project assets #100324
    area-Host
  • Remove DAM annotations from enum converter #100347
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • FixOptRepeat without VNForCast fix #100355
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • FixOptRepeat without optAssertionProp_Update fix #100360
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • FixOptRepeat without AssertionProp handle asserts #100359
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add more checking to `GenTreeArrAddr::ParseArrayAddress()` #100327
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] JIT: Fixed incorrect reversed condition for GT #100372
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.5
  • BlobBuilder.LinkSuffix/LinkPrefix need to Free zero length chunks #100039
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Initialize values for yield normalization during startup #99991
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix CA2022 warnings (Avoid inexact read with 'Stream.Read') #100352
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging][mono][debugger] Fix inspect Span<byte> #99844
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.5
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Simplify BigInteger.Multiply #98587
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-staging] Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #98385
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #98384
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #98383
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Don't unset ALPN list pointer during ALPN selection callback. #99670
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 8.0.5
  • [cdac] Physical contract descriptor spec #100365
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Add hash operation counts to OpenSSL to prevent process crashes #100371
    area-System.Security
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.Abs() and Sve.Add() #100134
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [browser][ws] Do not duplicate code executed in `local_on_close` #99685
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Enable FEATURE_PERFMAP on OSX, and update perfjitdump.cpp to work on OSX #99986
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][HybridGlobalization] Fix ShortDatePattern year format to be "yyyy" #99908
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Globalization, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] WiP: Simplify flags for passing struct in registers #100080
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser][MT] mono_wasm_schedule_synchronization_context #100251
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add dynamic allocation sampling following a Poisson process instead of using a static threshold #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement `ShuffleUnsafe` methods #99596

    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet command does not honor "globalPackagesFolder" in nuget.config file #39874
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.3.24175.24] CS1646 error when building Hawaso #39850
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.3.24175.24] CS1061 error when building OrchardCore #39847
  • AlpineARM32 Only, running dotnet new command will be Stuck with long time high CPU consumption after installing net9.0.100-preview.3.24175.24 #39835
  • string.IndexOf() on Thai Culture , Windows11, 64 bits, .net5,6,7,8, return incorrect index #39832

Closed

  • sdk 8.0.201-1 not in ubuntu feed #39352
  • Referencing the Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk NuGet package did NOT fix this issue for `dotnet test` commands. They are still failing in build environments. #39814

PullRequests

Created

  • DO NOT MERGE Check install scripts changes #39866
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Rewrite Newtonsoft version in testhost.deps.json #39865
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update build.yml #39846
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Migrate to 1ES templates for internal builds #39845
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Migrate to 1ES templates for internal builds #39844
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Migrate to 1ES templates for internal builds #39841
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add `http` prefix when docker config detect a insecure registry #39840
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Migrate to 1ES templates for internal builds #39839
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Migrate to 1ES templates for internal builds #39838
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix matcher null which results in ArgumentNullException #39873
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Versions.props #39842
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Update the msbuild version to a version that includes additional fixes #39641
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Update the msbuild version to a version that includes additional fixes #39830
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2417201 #39828
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Respect the profile attribute on runtime packs #39402
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Rewrite dotnet watch command line parsing #39618
    untriaged, Area-Watch

PullRequests

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Code fix for IDE0065 (using must be outside namespace) creates invalid code for using aliases #72782
    Backlog
  • Improve IDE0035 for bool variables that are de facto constants #72781
  • while coding with C#, show the comment of local variable when mouse hover up #72780
  • Exception while starting a debug session (nothing was typed) #72779
  • Implicit Usings don't appear greyed out like other unused usings #72776
  • GetCollectionExpressionConversion should accumulate and propagate dependencies from HasCollectionExpressionApplicableAddMethod in the success case #72770
  • Assert failures in lowering for collection expression with ComImport collection type with ref omitted argument in Add #72769

Closed

  • Params Span<T> errors ambiguity for null and inline arrays #72748
  • Bad IDE0028 suggestion #72701
    Backlog
  • IDE0290 (primary constructor) code fix crashes on nested enum. #72784
  • Exception #72785
  • `AsInterfaceMember` should handle expression-bodied properly #65932
    17.10
  • Incorrect nullability warning in local function #40157
    Backlog
  • Incorrect CS8602 warning #44805
    Backlog
  • System.NullReferenceException should say which reference is null #72545
  • Search in options window doesn't show all matches in the pages tree view #72639
  • IDE0078 should be configurable to only apply to type checks #72711

PullRequests

Created

  • Change how creation dates are specified in the SG api #72794
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove ServiceHub config for desktop host #72793
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Experimental idea: Remove the global file-path-to-document-ids map at the solution level. (alternate 1) #72792
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Improve batching for document add / removes for reduced allocations #72791
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update Rename UI to accommodate for getting suggestions automatically #72790
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Experimental idea: Remove the global file-path-to-document-ids map at the solution level. #72789
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Edit and continue diagnostic source #72787
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Remove unneeded value in build script #72783
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove eventing from ExternalErrorDiagnosticUpdateSource #72774
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Params side of the design changes around Add methods #72771
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Disallow changing from ObservableCollection<> to List<> to prevent breaking semantics #72788
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Share info-bar creation code #72765
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Always run OOP process on .net core (part 2) #72773
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix crash in 'use primary constructor' #72786
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Always run OOP process on .net core #72772
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • simple refactoring for copilot types #72768
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Handle adding expression body members when generating interface declaration #72583
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Update path to OneOffInsertion.ps1 #72775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: require Add method callable with a single argument for class and struct types that do not use [CollectionBuilder] #72654
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove diagnostic scaffolding for sending diagnostics events from HostDiagnosticUpdateSource. #72731
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Align the logic we have for document syncing with project syncing #72760
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Provide option to only update source-generators on special events (like a build) #72494
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Change CS8618 message: required to 'required' #72767
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Handle razor `@:` transitions as comments #72745
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [VB] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants, or whose embedded expressions are only string as optimized as `&` operator or C# (pre 10.0) #72611
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Add support for AIOSP to search only the current document or current project. #72293
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid creating result temp for switch-expressions #69194
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Merge latest bits from `main` branch into extensions branch #72684
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.VisualDiagnostics #72296
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Delay slicing in list pattern until all other element patterns are matched #70615
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.10

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #54832
  • Using [FromForm] in Web API controller action when object contains a delegate causes memory leak #54829
  • How to provide instance for BlazorWebView in xaml page to reuse single Text editor component with multiple BlazorWebView #54823
  • `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ControllerBase.Created()` returns a `StatusCodes.Status204NoContent` not `StatusCodes.Status201Created` #54822
  • Brotli compressor not working when compressing small text output #54827
  • .net core 是否在Aot支持反射功能这一块 #54817
  • Avoid magic string in asp-page-handler #54816

Closed

  • [feat] Add `PasswordOptions.RequireLetter` #54341
  • Make types in Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.KeyManagement.Internal internal #54712
  • SDK is missing some packages for .NET Framework targets #54696
  • Avoid resetting AccessFailedCount by CheckPasswordSignIn in ASP.Net Identity #54733
  • .NET 8 Blazor Web App with ADFS/OpenId Connect throws error unless I turn off SSL validation when hosted in AKS #54831
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #54819
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #54820
  • Programmatically set preventDefault and stopPropagation #54782
  • Blazor handling of overlay components #54768
  • Enhanced navigation triggers the initialization of layout components #54794
  • DataAnnotationsValidator fails to [in]validate on submit a model that it successfully [in]validates while editing #54792
  • Blazor PWA not fetching app when its cached -> cannot work offline #54767
  • DataProtectionProvider persist keys to BLOB does not use keys from BLOB #54697
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Blazor WASM - API authorization disappears on refresh #54666
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext #54764
  • SecurityTokenMalformedException after updating to .NET 8 #52286
  • ClaimsPrincipal on ASP.NET Core v8.0.100-rc.2.23502.2 Doesn't Contain All Claims From The OpenIdConnect Token #51538
  • shaw 256 Failed to find a valid digest in the 'integrity' attribute for resource .net 8 #54558

PullRequests

Created

  • DO NOT MERGE - install scripts check #54828
    area-infrastructure
  • Handle JSON comments and trailing commas in user-jwts #54826
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution

Merged

  • [Blazor] Port interactive server root component fix to `main` #54833
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview4
  • Test fixes #54825
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • Add entry-point APIs for OpenAPI support #54789
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Implement Redis distributed cache without Lua #54689
    feature-caching, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Fix route analyzer performance with highly concatenated strings #54763
    Servicing-consider, area-minimal, 8.0.x
  • Use SearchValues throughout dotnet/aspnetcore (part 2) #54804
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Increase logs and delays in CanLaunchPhotinoWebViewAndClickButton #54608
    area-blazor, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • add readme for package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation #54508
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-28
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NavigationPage.SetTitleIconImageSource Cases crash on iOS #21518
  • On Android when you add a NavigationPage to the FlyoutPage.Flyout, an exception is thrown #21515
  • [Windows] Images should not cover text if they're too big inside a button #21513
    .NET 8 SR4
  • SetAppThemeColor crashes with NRE #21503
  • DisplayPromptAsync colors the background gray when entering values #21499
  • Bugzilla44166 now failing after ThemeResourcesChange fix #21495
    .NET 8 SR4
  • CollectionView items not resizing correctly when ItemsLayout is GridItemsLayout #21494

Closed

  • [BUG] Back button is not visible on the navigation bar in light mode #20811
    Backlog
  • CollectionView with ItemSpacing => Infinite layout loop Android #21379
    .NET 8 SR4
  • [Bug] [Android] Modal page shows behind android navigation bar after navigating to another modal page and rotating screen on tablet only #20798
  • On Maui Android, page dimennsions are always empty #17154

PullRequests

Created

  • Making sure FindMauiContext fallbacks to default for the title icon i… #21519
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Prevent image from covering text in buttons if the image is too big #21516
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview3] Update preview3 versions #21514
  • Document NavigableElement #21507
  • [Trimming] Enable trimming and AOT analyzers #21505
  • [Trimming] Remove unnecessary regular expressions #21497
    area/app-size 🤏

Merged

  • [net9.0] Move to 9.0.100 preview4 #21510
  • [net9.0] Fix rollback for net9 #21512
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #21511
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview3] [net9.0] Bump the reference to the net8.0 workload #21509
  • [net9.0] Bump the reference to the net8.0 workload #21508
  • [net9.0] [testing] Enable Windows UITests back #20727
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net9.0] Make a green run for p3 before going to p4 #21500
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #21392
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Trimming] Enable trimming and AOT analyzers in Core #21076

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ChangeTracking not working as expected when using Collections with backing field #33427
  • Scaffolding: Optionally including the `nullable` directive for generated code #33426
  • Migration tries to alter column type of computed column if CLR type changes. #33425
  • Global query filters do not produce same SQL statements as query by DbSet #33424
  • For "Contains" queries of numeric values, just use the value in an "IN" statement instead of casting, converting, or using JSON. #33423
  • How to add only an incremental migration through IMigrationsScaffolder? #33422
  • Expose database row from IMaterializationInterceptor #33421
  • In precompiled operator interceptors, access closure fields via unsafe accessor when possible #33418
    Backlog

Closed

  • Ignoring Table creation and setting up Foreign Key relation when entities mapping #33419

PullRequests

Merged

  • API review changes #33420
  • Centralize and clean up diagnostic IDs #33415

Updated

  • Implement precompiled queries #33297
  • API review changes #33412
  • Introduce liftable constants to shaper to prepare for precompilation #33351

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-28
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Make SDK previews be in the preview.0 band #19231

Merged

  • Fixup parsing installer sha from VMR build tag #19227
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #19208
  • Add missing using statement to source-build task #19229
  • Increase the timeout for Windows builds #19228
  • [wasm] Use current SDK pack for down level TFM #19199
    Area-NetSDK
  • Upload logs and artifacts for non-1ES VMR builds #19224

Updated

  • Package source mappings - follow up #19223
  • Move unified build sdk validation to a test project #19090
  • Enable scenario test execution in VMR build #19222
  • [main] Rebootstrap with latest changes #19145
  • Enable roslyn for unified build #18769
